Title: Walk Through the Valley
Writer: Debbie Ivanrie-King (screenplay), Debbie Ivanrie-King (story), Debbie Ivanrie-King
Actors: Darryl Booker, Bridgette Y. White, Victor Arnez, Leonard Bruce
Plot: A captivating story about love, infidelity, duplicity and lies! A man's double life with the two women he loves. One woman is of high respectability; his wife, suddenly faced with the fight...
